name: Shoot N' Survive
description:
"The dead have risen, they roam the very streets you walk, fight off the undead and see how long you can survive. Death is inevitable." 

This was a short playable demo my group and I made for our ISTA 424 VR game development class. Due to it being an online class where not everyone was able to get a VR headset this game emulates the experience of VR through mouse and keyboard controls. 

Assets used:

For the blood particle effect.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/realistic-blood-fx-45028#des...

For the streets made in the level.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/small-town-america-streets-free-59759#d...

For the buildings used in the level.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/open-residential-building-pack-133275# description

For the ammo boxes used in the level. 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/ammo-157327

We have been able to obtain the sound effects via online by this link below. https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/zombie-174

 As for the zombies and animations are owned and reserved by its owners that we have used during our game, by several online sources, via links below. https://www.cgtrader.com/3d-models/character/fantasy-character/zombie-pack-v2 https://mocaponline.com/collections/unity/products/unity-zombie-starter

Contributors - Souvenir Tachado, Andre Martinez, James Traxler
